pages.title: Death
pages.text: Analysis of your stored skillset has concluded that your self-preservation instincts have degenerated beyond repair.$(br2)To account for your incompetence, we have synced all of your personal data to the $(item)Cloud$().

Upon death we will reconstitute your remains and $(item)Restore$() your previously held items.$(br2)If you did happen to die, do not beat yourself up about it, we already knew this eventually would happen.
